Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Updated: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Washington
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses rrted NB: Austin, Washington, Central, Lake, & Austin; SB: Austin, Lake, Parkside, Corcoran, Central, Washington, & Austin at Austin/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Updated: #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage at Austin/Washington.

Northbound buses will operate via Austin, Washington, Central, Lake, and Austin.

Southbound buses will operate via Austin, Lake, Parkside, Corcoran, Central, Washington, and Austin.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 83rd, Western, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Kedzie, 83rd, Western, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Kedzie.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
